languages.text: "Вы не только {d|Encyclopedia:BS_SolonornOnRaycadDecision}забрали мой отряд с умирающего мира{/d}, но еще и согласились встретиться. Это вселяет в меня силы — как вы выразились — "выпрашивать".

traits.locale_text: "Вы не только {d|Encyclopedia:BS_SolonornOnRaycadDecision}забрали мой отряд с умирающего мира{/d}, но еще и согласились встретиться. Это вселяет в меня силы "выпрашивать".

languages.text: "You {d|Encyclopedia:BS_SolonornOnRaycadDecision}saved my squad from a dying world{/d}, and you also agreed to meet with me. Both facts have emboldened me to... 'beg,' as you put it."
languages.original_text: "Вы не только {d|Encyclopedia:BS_SolonornOnRaycadDecision}забрали мой отряд с умирающего мира{/d}, но еще и согласились встретиться. Это вселяет в меня силы — как вы выразились — "выпрашивать".

traits.locale_text: "You saved my squad from a dying world, and you also agreed to meet with me. Both facts have emboldened me to 'beg.'"

languages.text: «{d|Encyclopedia:BS_SolonornOnRaycadDecision}Salvó a mi escuadrón de un mundo moribundo{/d} y ha aceptado reunirse conmigo. Esos factores me han otorgado la confianza necesaria para... "suplicar", como dice».
languages.original_text: "You {d|Encyclopedia:BS_SolonornOnRaycadDecision}saved my squad from a dying world{/d}, and you also agreed to meet with me. Both facts have emboldened me to... 'beg,' as you put it."

traits.locale_text: «Salvó a mi escuadrón de un mundo moribundo y ha aceptado reunirse conmigo. Esos factores me han otorgado la confianza necesaria para... "suplicar", como dice».
«Salvó a mi escuadrón de un mundo moribundo y ha aceptado reunirse conmigo. Esos factores me han otorgado la confianza necesaria para... "suplicar", como dice».

languages.text: “是你从那个{d|Encyclopedia:BS_SolonornOnRaycadDecision}垂死的世界中拯救了我的小队{/d}，也是你答应和我见面。正是基于这样的事实，我才会……用你的话说，‘求’你帮忙。”
languages.original_text: "You {d|Encyclopedia:BS_SolonornOnRaycadDecision}saved my squad from a dying world{/d}, and you also agreed to meet with me. Both facts have emboldened me to... 'beg,' as you put it."

traits.locale_text: “是你从那个垂死的世界中拯救了我的小队，也是你答应和我见面。正是基于这样的事实，我才会……用你的话说，‘求’你帮忙。”
“是你从那个垂死的世界中拯救了我的小队，也是你答应和我见面。正是基于这样的事实，我才会……用你的话说，‘求’你帮忙。”

languages.text: « Vous avez {d|Encyclopedia:BS_SolonornOnRaycadDecision}sauvé mon escouade d'un monde en perdition{/d}, et vous avez également accepté de me recevoir. Autant de signaux qui m'ont incité à... "quémander". »
languages.original_text: "You {d|Encyclopedia:BS_SolonornOnRaycadDecision}saved my squad from a dying world{/d}, and you also agreed to meet with me. Both facts have emboldened me to... 'beg,' as you put it."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez sauvé mon escouade d'un monde en perdition, et vous avez également accepté de me recevoir. Autant de signaux qui m'ont incité à... "quémander". »
« Vous avez sauvé mon escouade d'un monde en perdition, et vous avez également accepté de me recevoir. Autant de signaux qui m'ont incité à... "quémander". »

languages.text: 「あなたは{d|Encyclopedia:BS_SolonornOnRaycadDecision}私の仲間を滅びゆく世界から救って{/d}、私と会うことにも同意してくれた。この二つの事実は私に『懇願』させる」
languages.original_text: "You {d|Encyclopedia:BS_SolonornOnRaycadDecision}saved my squad from a dying world{/d}, and you also agreed to meet with me. Both facts have emboldened me to... 'beg,' as you put it."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは私の仲間を滅びゆく世界から救って、私と会うことにも同意してくれた。この二つの事実は私に『懇願』させる」
「あなたは私の仲間を滅びゆく世界から救って、私と会うことにも同意してくれた。この二つの事実は私に『懇願』させる」

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:BS_SolonornOnRaycadDecision}Adamlarımı ölmekte olan bir dünyadan kurtardınız{/d} ve benimle görüşmeyi kabul ettiniz. Her iki gerçek de dediğiniz gibi 'ayaklarınıza kapanmak' için cesaret bulmamı sağladı."
languages.original_text: "You {d|Encyclopedia:BS_SolonornOnRaycadDecision}saved my squad from a dying world{/d}, and you also agreed to meet with me. Both facts have emboldened me to... 'beg,' as you put it."

traits.locale_text: "Adamlarımı ölmekte olan bir dünyadan kurtardınız ve benimle görüşmeyi kabul ettiniz. Her iki gerçek de dediğiniz gibi 'ayaklarınıza kapanmak' için cesaret bulmamı sağladı."
"Adamlarımı ölmekte olan bir dünyadan kurtardınız ve benimle görüşmeyi kabul ettiniz. Her iki gerçek de dediğiniz gibi 'ayaklarınıza kapanmak' için cesaret bulmamı sağladı."

languages.text: "Ihr habt {d|Encyclopedia:BS_SolonornOnRaycadDecision}meine Einheit von einer sterbenden Welt gerettet{/d} und Euch bereit erklärt, mich zu treffen. Beide Umstände haben mich bewogen, zu 'flehen', wie Ihr es ausdrückt."
languages.original_text: "You {d|Encyclopedia:BS_SolonornOnRaycadDecision}saved my squad from a dying world{/d}, and you also agreed to meet with me. Both facts have emboldened me to... 'beg,' as you put it."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt meine Einheit von einer sterbenden Welt gerettet und Euch bereit erklärt, mich zu treffen. Beide Umstände haben mich bewogen, zu 'flehen', wie Ihr es ausdrückt."
